title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: There are incorrect labels in the Update Test Suite dialog.
OB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' (without a space). The status line mentions 'methods' instead of 'types'. The action name 'TestSuite' should be written as 'Test Suite'.
EB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be written as 'Test Classes to be included' (with a space). The status line should mention 'types' instead of 'methods'. The action name 'TestSuite' should be written as 'Test Suite'.
SR: Update the labels in the Update Test Suite dialog to correctly display 'Test Classes to be included', change the status line to mention 'types' instead of 'methods', and update the action name to 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
